from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from mqtt import *
from machine import RTC
import ntptime
import time
from event_manager import *
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602

event_manager.reset()

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin14.pin, 4)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__priority_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global RT, spec, RH, SM, speed, GDD, LUX, onfan, fannn
  if th_C3_B4ng_tin == '1':
    spec = 1
  if th_C3_B4ng_tin == '0':
    spec = 0

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__led_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global RT, spec, RH, SM, speed, GDD, LUX, onfan, fannn
  if th_C3_B4ng_tin == '2':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
  if th_C3_B4ng_tin == '3':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__water_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global RT, spec, RH, SM, speed, GDD, LUX, onfan, fannn
  if th_C3_B4ng_tin == '2':
    pin10.write_digital((1))
  if th_C3_B4ng_tin == '3':
    pin10.write_digital((0))

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__fanspeed_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global RT, spec, RH, SM, speed, GDD, LUX, onfan, fannn
  pin0.write_analog(round(translate((int(th_C3_B4ng_tin)), 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def l_C3_A0m_g_C3_AC__C4_91_C3_B3():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, spec, RH, SM, speed, GDD, LUX, onfan, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb, aiot_lcd1602
  mqtt.on_receive_message('priority', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__priority_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('led', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__led_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('water', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__water_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('fanspeed', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__fanspeed_)

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

def on_event_timer_callback_T_U_a_j_H():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, spec, RH, SM, speed, GDD, LUX, onfan, fannn
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  RT = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  RH = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  SM = translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4096, 0, 100)
  LUX = pin1.read_analog()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('RT:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(3, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RT)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(7, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('RH:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RH)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('LUX')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('      ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(LUX)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('SM:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(SM)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  mqtt.publish('temperature', RT)
  mqtt.publish('moisture', RH)
  mqtt.publish('light', LUX)
  mqtt.publish('soilmoisture', SM)
  time.sleep_ms(2000)
  if SM <= 20 and spec == 0:
    pin10.write_digital((1))
    mqtt.publish('water', '1')
  if SM > 60 and spec == 0:
    pin10.write_digital((0))
    mqtt.publish('water', '0')
  if LUX <= 2000 and spec == 0:
    GDD = (GDD if isinstance(GDD, (int, float)) else 0) + 1
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
    mqtt.publish('led', '1')
  if LUX > 2000 and spec == 0:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
    mqtt.publish('led', '0')
  if (RT > 35 or RH > 60) and spec == 0:
    mqtt.publish('fan', '1')
    pin0.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    mqtt.publish('fanspeed', '70')
  if (RT < 27 or RH < 30) and spec == 0:
    mqtt.publish('fan', '0')
    pin0.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    mqtt.publish('fanspeed', '0')

event_manager.add_timer_event(60000, on_event_timer_callback_T_U_a_j_H)

if True:
  display.scroll('Hi')
  mqtt.connect_wifi('Halohalo', 'anchaodabat')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='io.adafruit.com', port=1883, username='darkchan', password='aio_GEhm28wyY2V5dbWBh5JSFSbYXRQT')
  display.scroll('OK')
  speed = 0
  SM = 0
  GDD = 0
  LUX = 0
  RH = 0
  RT = 0
  spec = 0
  onfan = 0
  mqtt.publish('priority', '0')
  mqtt.publish('water', '0')
  mqtt.publish('led', '0')
  mqtt.publish('fan', '0')
  mqtt.publish('fanspeed', '0')
  l_C3_A0m_g_C3_AC__C4_91_C3_B3()
  ntptime.settime()
  (year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour, minute, second, milisecond) = RTC().datetime()
  RTC().init((year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour+7, minute, second, milisecond))

while True:
  mqtt.check_message()
  event_manager.run()
  if GDD >= 9600:
    while True:
      tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ff0000'))
      tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffa500'))
      tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
      tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#00ff00'))
      tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffff00'))
      tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
